GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix accepting connection request for invalid SPSM

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit d7efeb93213becae13c6a12e4150ce1e07bd2c49. For more details please see the references link.
